content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `find`. It computes median over arbitrary array. Provide an example

Here is the implementation of `find` function in Julia:

```julia
function find(arr)
    n = length(arr)
    sort!(arr)  # Sort the array
    if n % 2 == 1   # If the length of the array is odd
        return arr[div(n, 2)+1]  # Return the middle element
    else          # If the length of the array is even
        return (arr[div(n, 2)] + arr[div(n, 2)+1]) / 2   # Return the average of two middle elements
    end
end
```

Here's an example:

```julia
arr = [12, 3, 4, 6, 9]
println("Median is ", find(arr))
```

This will output: `Median is 6.0`
